title: This boke doth create all of the beste waters artyfycialles and the vertues and properties of the same, moche profytable for the poore sycke, set forth, by syr Roger Becon Freere.
author: Bacon, Roger, 1214?-1294.
notes: Printer's name from colophon; publication place and publication date suggested by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
